name: Vibra-Tite® PB330 Structural Adhesive
description: Vibra-Tite® PB330 Structural Adhesive is a high performance two part methacrylate adhesive engineered to bond a wide range of materials including metal and plastics, especially fiberglass. It offers outstanding bond strength, is extremely durable, with excellent impact and weathering properties. Vibra-Tite® PB330 greatly increases the reliability of finished assemblies with exceptional toughness, its ability to with stand extreme temperature fluctuation and thermal cycling, and resistance to a wide range of chemicals and environmental conditions.
